structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXXI. VIZCAYA GARDENS AND MUSEUM TRUST

law.catch_line: Creation of the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens Trust.

text.section:
Sec. 2-1111. Creation of the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens Trust.
There is hereby created and established as an agency and instrumentality of Miami-Dade County a revocable trust which shall be named and known as the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens Trust (hereinafter referred to as "the Trust").
